data.text: Male Jisua hah Diabol methêma a om rangin Ratha'n ramchâra a tuong zoi.4:1: Heb 2:18; 4:15
Sûn sômminli jân sômminli sâk sâkloiin a om suolechu Jisua hah a vonchâm zoia.
Hanchu Diabol a honga, a kôm, “Pathien Nâipasal ni nîn chu, hi lungngei hih vâipôl chang rangin chongpêk roh,” a tia.
Hannirese, Jisua'n a kôm han, “Pathien Lekhabu'n Miriem hi vâipôl korongin ring no nia, Pathien bâia chong hongsuokin kêng an a ring rang ani,”4:4: Bal 8:3 tiin a thuona.
Hanchu Diabol'n Jisua hah, Khopuilien Inthieng Jerusalema a tuonga, Biekin sîpinsângtaka a mindinga,
male a kôm, “Pathien Nâipasal ni nîn chu nangma nethenin inchôm inla, Pathien Lekhabu'n ati anghan:4:6: Lap 91:11-12
Jisua'n a kôm, “Aniatachu Pathien Lekhabu'n, Pumapa na Pathien minsin no roh, ti khom ânziek sa,”4:7: Bal 6:16 tiin a thuona.
Male, Diabol hah muol insângtaka a tuonga rammuola rêngramngei murdi le an roiinpuinangei a min mua.
A kôm, “khûkinbilin chubai mi ni mûkin chu hi ngei murdi hih nang pêk let ki tih,” a ti pea.
Male Jisua'n a kôm, “Soitan, rotpai roh! Pathien Lekhabu'n, ‘Pumapa na Pathien vai chubaimûk inla, ama sin vai tho roh a ti!’” 4:10: Bal 6:13 tiin a thuona.
Masuole chu Diabol'n Jisua a mâka; male vântîrtonngei an juonga, ama an juong san zoi.
Jisua'n, John an sûr ti a riet lechu, Galilee rama a thengpata.4:12: Mat 14:3; Mk 6:17; Luk 3:19-20
Nazareth a mâka, Capernaum khopuia ava om zoia, mahah Galilee Dîl pang Zebulun le Naphtali ramhuola om ani.4:13: Joh 2:12
Mahi dêipu Isaiah lei ti hah ahongtung adikna ranga ani:
“Zebulun ram le Naphtali ram,4:15,16: Isa 9:1-2
Ijîng nuoia om mingei han
Ma zora renga hah Jisua'n, “Nin nunsienangei renga inhei ta roi, Invân Rêngram hih anâi zoi sikin!”4:17: Mat 3:2 tiin thurchi misîr a phut kelen zoi.
Jisua'n Galilee dîl pang rûla a chai anghan ngasûrpungei lâibungsa inik a mu ngeia, Simon (Peter an ti) le anâipa Andrew, dîla lên leh nga an sûra.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Ko kôm hong ungla, miriem sûrna chang nangni minchu ki tih,” a tipe ngeia.
Voikhat rengin an lênngei an mâkraka, an jûi kelen zoi.

Ava se nôk uol vietin chu lâibungsa adang, Zebedee nâipasalngei Jacob le John ava mu ngei nôka. Anni ngei hah an pa Zebedee leh an rukuong sûnga an lei oma, an lênngei an lei sina. Jisua'n a koi ngeia,
male voikhat rengin rukuong le an pa mâkrakin, an jûi kelen zoi.
Jisua'n Galilee ram pumpuia a sea, synagog in sûng ngeia a minchua, Rêngram Thurchi Sa a misira, mingei lâia natna le damloina jât tamtak a mindama.4:23: Mat 9:35; Mk 1:39

Ama chungroi hah Syria ram pumpuia ânthang zoia, masikin mingei han damloi murdi, natna jât tamtak le intaknangei renga an hong tuong ngeia: ramkhori sûrngei, risangol inveingei, phalkhatthi ngei, hah Jisua'n a lei mindam ngei pak ani.
Galilee ram le Khopui Sôm ngei renga, Jerusalem renga, Judea ram renga le Jordan râla ramngei renga mipui tamtak ama an jûi zoi ani.
